slogan: Delta Code Solutions delivers innovative digital solutions that drive business growth, efficiency, and success.
features: Responsive Design – Har device (mobile, tablet, desktop) par perfectly adjust hota hai
Clear Call-to-Action Buttons – “Get Started” aur “Learn More” user ko direct action dene ke liye.
Modern Hero Section – High-quality background image aur bold headline se strong first impression
Easy Navigation Bar – Simple aur user-friendly menu for smooth browsing experience.
description: Delta Code Solutions is a leading software development company dedicated to delivering innovative, scalable, and reliable digital solutions. We focus on understanding our clients’ unique business needs and providing technology-driven strategies that drive growth and efficiency. With a skilled team and proven processes, we ensure high-quality, timely delivery across web, mobile, and enterprise platforms. Committed to building long-term partnerships, we help businesses achieve measurable success and stay ahead in a rapidly evolving digital landscape.

slogan: A sleek and responsive software agency website built using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
features: Modern landing page with service-based sections
Reusable and strongly typed components
Tailwind-powered responsive layout
Fast rendering and optimized performance using Next.js
Professional UI with clean typography and smooth visuals
description: CodeVia is a modern tech agency website built using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It includes sections for services, about company, technologies, portfolio showcase, and a responsive design suitable for any software or IT company.

slogan: EduManage is a student management system designed to simplify academic administration and performance tracking.
features: User Authentication - Secure login system for administrators and teachers with session management
Student Management - Add, update, delete, and view student details with structured records
Attendance Module - Record daily attendance and view attendance summaries
Marks Management - Add, update, and analyze student marks with automated performance insights
Dashboard Analytics - Real-time display of total students, attendance count, and average marks
Responsive Design - Fully responsive UI for smooth performance across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
description: EduManage is a modern and efficient student management system developed to streamline school and college administration. It enables administrators and teachers to manage student records, attendance, and marks with ease. The dashboard provides insightful analytics such as total students, daily attendance, and average marks. Built using React for the frontend and NestJS with MySQL on the backend, the system ensures fast, secure, and scalable operations. Its clean and responsive interface provides a professional and user-friendly experience for educational institutions.

slogan: WearHub is an AI-powered fashion e-commerce platform that helps users discover outfits tailored to their preferences.
features: AI Fashion Advisor – Personalized outfit suggestions based on height, weight, gender, and skin tone
Smart Product Display – Filter and browse clothing items by category, color, and price
User Authentication – Secure login and registration system using NextAuth.js
Responsive & Modern UI – Built with TailwindCSS and lucide-react icons for a sleek shopping experience
Interactive UX – File uploads with react-dropzone, dropdowns with react-select, and alerts via SweetAlert2
Deployed on Vercel with MongoDB Atlas integration for fast and scalable performance
description: WearHub is an innovative AI-based e-commerce platform designed to provide personalized clothing recommendations. Users can input their height, weight, skin tone, and gender to receive outfit suggestions generated by AI. The project integrates Next.js for the frontend, MongoDB Atlas for data management, and Cloudinary for image storage. Its modern and responsive UI is built using TailwindCSS, with dynamic interactivity through React libraries such as react-select, react-dropzone, and react-hot-toast. Deployed on Vercel, WearHub delivers a smooth and intelligent shopping experience.

slogan: A professional health and wellness web app for tracking BMI, ideal weight, and fitness progress.
features: BMI Calculator – Calculates Body Mass Index based on height and weight
Ideal Weight Estimator – Helps users find their healthy weight range
Health Insights – Displays personalized health metrics and recommendations
Smart UI – Designed with modern HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for smooth interactivity
Fully Responsive – Works seamlessly across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices
Lightweight & Fast – Optimized for performance and user-friendly experience
description: Health Metrics Pro is a professional health and wellness web project built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to calculate their BMI, estimate their ideal weight, and receive instant health insights. The application features a clean and responsive design, optimized for all devices, ensuring a smooth and engaging user experience. This project demonstrates strong frontend development skills and a focus on practical, real-world functionality for fitness and wellness tracking.

slogan: A modern full-stack e-commerce platform for seamless online shopping experience.
features: Product Catalog – Browse and search a wide range of products with categories and filters
User Authentication – Secure signup, login, and profile management with JWT tokens
Shopping Cart & Checkout – Add products to cart, manage orders, and checkout securely
Order Management – View order history, track status, and manage returns
Admin Dashboard – Manage products, categories, users, and orders efficiently
Responsive Design – Fully responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
AI-Powered Recommendations – Personalized product suggestions based on user preferences
Secure Payments – Integration with popular payment gateways for safe transactions
Performance Optimized – Fast loading and smooth user experience
description: EchoMart is a full-stack e-commerce platform built using Next.js and TypeScript for the frontend, NestJS and Node.js for the backend, with PostgreSQL as the database. It allows users to browse, search, and purchase products seamlessly. Users can create accounts, manage their profiles, add products to the cart, and complete secure checkout using integrated payment gateways. The platform includes an admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and users, along with AI-powered product recommendations for personalized shopping. Designed to be fully responsive, EchoMart ensures a smooth and engaging experience across all devices, demonstrating strong full-stack development skills, secure authentication, and scalable architecture for real-world e-commerce applications.

slogan: A modern and interactive personal portfolio built to showcase projects, skills, and experience.
features: Fully Responsive – Optimized for all screen sizes and devices
Elegant Design – Professional color palette with smooth animations using Framer Motion
Modular Components – Clean, reusable React components for scalability
Dynamic Projects Section – Displays project data fetched from JSON or API
Contact Integration – Send messages directly via the contact form
SEO & Performance Optimized – Deployed on Vercel for fast loading and reliability
description: This personal portfolio website was developed to showcase my professional journey as a full-stack developer. It features a clean and elegant UI, dynamic project listings, and smooth animations powered by Framer Motion. Built using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, the site is fully responsive and optimized for performance. The design emphasizes clarity, usability, and a modern look, making it a perfect platform to present my work, skills, and contact details. Deployed on Vercel, it ensures reliability and fast performance across all devices.
